wikipedia_page.main: Ernest Thornton (18 May 1905 – 5 February 1992) was a British Labour Party politician.  He was elected Member of Parliament (MP) for Farnworth in a 1952 by-election, and served until his retirement at the 1970 general election. His successor John Roper retained the seat for the Labour Party.

response: The Farnworth by-election was held on 27 November 1952.  The election was held due to the death of the incumbent Labour MP, George Tomlinson.  It was won by the Labour candidate Ernest Thornton.
